extraction_info.full_body_img: Extract all frames from full_body_video.mp4 to full_body_img/
extraction_info.crops_328: Extract all frames from crops_328_video.mp4 to cache/crops_328/
extraction_info.rois_320: Extract all frames from rois_320_video.mp4 to cache/rois_320/
extraction_info.model_inputs: Extract all frames from model_inputs_video.mp4 to cache/model_inputs/
